item.description:
Come out for a rousing night of enjoying Tucker's over the top antics and not quite funny jokes at Trinity Brewhouse this time around.

Maybe we'll win the $40 first prize and growler! (way better than Snookers $20 first prize)

I'll be there at 7:30pm to secure a table.

Trivia and Music starts at 8 and finishes around 10pm.
item.how_to_find_us: Sorry, no jester cap yet, I'll have a meetup sign and probably a copy of Rhode Island Curiosities.
item.why: I'm not very good at trivia and need your help...
item.name: Sue Me, I Like Trivia (the 5T's edition) @ Trinity
